column4: The company I work for are asking me what kind of laptop I want.. and I am split wether to go with an Apple with Mac osx or go for a real linux distro on a normal computer.. what do you think?
you won't have the option of OS X unless you get a mac, but you can install windows, ubuntu, whatever on the mac
